product_name: Serfas Astro Mountain Bike Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for all-mountain riding, the women's Serfas Astro Mountain Bike Shoes support your feet securely while on the bike and let you stride comfortably off the bike. New easy-release buckle and 2 rip-and-stick straps keep your feet snug and let you make quick fit adjustments on the fly. Wide toe box and soft, cushioned insoles provide superb comfort. Serfas Astro Mountain Bike Shoes for women have breathable mesh inserts for highly efficient ventilation. Closeout.
short_description: Great for all-mountain riding, the women's Serfas Astro Mountain Bike Shoes support your feet securely while on the bike and let you stride comfortably off the bike.
